title: Measure method
content: ・Press the measurement start button, then cover the camera lens with one finger. Wait until the measurement is finished!
・Measures your heart rate by detecting slight changes in the color and brightness of your fingertips.
・Please perform the measurement in a bright place or turn on the flashlight for accurate measurements.
・Cover the camera lens with one fingertip.
・Please keep your body relaxed and do not move your fingers until the measurement is complete.
